feed.title: NetBird Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.26.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update account attributes only when there is a domain by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1701
  • Remove deprecated Rules API endpoints by @surik in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1523
  • Add support for inviting/deleting users via Zitadel by @synfinatic in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1572
  • Disable force jsonfile variable by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1611
  • Unblock ACL apply filtering because of dns probes by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1711
  • Avoid creating duplicate groups with the same name by @braginini in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1579
  • Validate authentik issuer url by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1723
  • Add missing dns domain to tests to avoid verbose test logs by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1724
  • Remove context niling by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1729
  • Add latency checks to peer connection and status output by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1725
  • Feature/exit nodes - Linux support by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1667
  • Change log level for JWT override message of single account mode by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1747
  • In meta info collect chassis serial by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1748
  • Add limited dashboard view by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1738

New Contributors

  • @synfinatic made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1572

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.26.3...v0.26.4

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.26.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature/peer validator by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1553
  • support to configure extra blacklist of iface in "up" command by @hoozecn in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1734
  • Fix invalid token on peer login due to the cache race by @braginini in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1763

New Contributors

  • @hoozecn made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1734

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.26.4...v0.26.5

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.26.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Ignore "Address family not supported by protocol" errors by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1766
  • Don't block on failed routing setup by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1768
  • Update network security image by @braginini in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1765

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.26.5...v0.26.6

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.27.0
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 3d2a2377 Don't return errors on disallowed routes (#1792)
  • 25f5f265 Timeout rule removing loop and catch IPv6 unsupported error in loop (#1791)
  • bb0d5c5b Linux legacy routing (#1774)
  • 79382951 Feature/exit nodes - Windows and macOS support (#1726)
  • 9af532fe Get scope from endpoint url instead of hardcoding (#1770)
  • 23a14737 Fix grammar in readme (#1778)
